title: Six professionals review the Mac Pro
description: Apple's Mac Pro is not a single product. There are no stock configurations aside from the it-has-to-start-somewhere $5,999 base setup. Customers can configure almost every Mac Pro to order, all the way up to a top spec with a 28-core Intel Xeon W processor and two AMD Radeon Pro Vega II Duo GPUs that hovers near $54,000. Reviewing the new Mac Pro has been an interesting challenge.  Read the full review here:  And the Apple Pro Display XDR review here:   Vox Media has affiliate partnerships. These do not influence editorial content, though Vox Media may earn commissions for products purchased via affiliate links.
